items.sentence: Tom is in his room, writing a letter to his grandmother.
Tom made a fool of himself when he was drunk last night.
Tom wants to work at the same hospital where Mary works.
I want everyone to show me his or her driver\'s license.
Tom noticed that not all the kids were paying attention.
Tom often spends his weekends in his cabin in the woods.
Tom often thinks of Mary when he hears a string quartet.
Tom often walks around the house without any clothes on.
Tom only had a few visitors when he was in the hospital.
Tom took off his bicycle helmet and put it on the table.
